mapper.select: select id, user_id, topic_id from mid_user_follow_topic where follow_topic_status = 1

select muca.user_id, q.question_id from mid_user_collect_answer as muca inner join answer as a on a.answer_id = muca.answer_id inner join question as q on q.question_id = a.question_id where muca.user_id = #{userId}

select muva.user_id, q.question_id from mid_user_vote_answer as muva inner join answer as a on a.answer_id = muva.answer_id inner join question as q on q.question_id = a.question_id where muva.vote = 1 and muva.user_id = #{userId}
